ComicInfo.Summary: A ship of rage cuts across the stars, carrying a man betrayed.: The Zombie Universeâ€™s Giant-Man story picks up when the Hulk returns from his exile with the Warbound of Sakaar. When he stops in Atilan to attack Black Bolt the Warbound are all killed and the Hulk is turned into a zombie by the zombie Inhumans. He then goes to earth and turns Sentry into a zombie.
ComicInfo.Title: A ship of rage cuts across the stars, carrying a man betrayed.
